channel.title: ███Creating New Items - HELP███
channel.description:
Hey, how would i create a whole new item? I want to create a new armor/weapon set for admins.
This admin set would be the exact item of another, except maybe a different color or something.
For Example: Zamorak Godsword = Admin Godsword, 1 Handed, Epic Stats. Bandos Chestplate = Admin Chestplate, Red, Epic Stats.
^Stuff like that.
Help is greatly appreciated. ;D

item.title: ███Creating New Items - HELP███
item.dc:creator: @_ikram _ikram
item.description:
@_ikram wrote:

You would have too create new models in the format of .dat, and import them to server & client.

Read full topic

item.title: ███Creating New Items - HELP███
item.dc:creator: @HAIGUYS HAIGUYS
item.description:
@HAIGUYS wrote:

i don’t know much, but i know you have to create new models, and put them into your client using the file, class8.java

Read full topic
